00023 #include "serverlog.h"
00024 #include "logexportdialog.h"

00026 #include <QDateTime>

00028 #include <QHBoxLayout>

00039 RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::ServerLog(QWidget* parent)
00040   :QWidget(parent)
00041 {
00042   // The main layout
00043   QVBoxLayout* vb1=new QVBoxLayout();
00044   this->setLayout(vb1);
00045 
00046   // The tree
00047   tree=new QTreeWidget();
00048 
00049   QStringList header;
00050   header << tr("Time") << tr("Level") << tr("Message");
00051   tree->setColumnCount(3);
00052   tree->setHeaderLabels(header);
00053   vb1->addWidget(tree);
00054 
00055   // The buttons layout
00056   QHBoxLayout* hb1=new QHBoxLayout();
00057   hb1->addStretch(1);
00058   vb1->addLayout(hb1);
00059 
00060   // The clear button
00061   QPushButton* btnClear=new QPushButton(tr("Clear"), this);
00062   hb1->addWidget(btnClear);
00063 
00064   // The export button
00065   QPushButton* btnExport=new QPushButton(tr("Export"), this);
00066   hb1->addWidget(btnExport);
00067 
00068   // Treewidget sorting preferences
00069   tree->setSortingEnabled(true);
00070   tree->sortItems ( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00071 
00072 
00073   // Connections
00074   connect( btnClear, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(clearLog()) );
00075   connect( btnExport, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(exportLog()) );
00076 }
00077 
00081 RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::~ServerLog(){
00082   delete tree;
00083   tree=NULL;
00084 }

00094 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::
00095 addMessage(tServerLogLevel lvl, const QString& msg){
00096   QString l;
00097   QColor r=Qt::red;
00098   QColor c;
00099 
00100   QTime time=QTime::currentTime();
00101   QString t=time.toString("hh:mm:ss");
00102 
00103   switch (lvl){
00104   case SLL_INFORMATIVE:
00105     l=tr("Information");
00106     c=Qt::black;
00107     break;
00108   case SLL_WARNING:
00109     l=tr("Warning");
00110     c=r.light(150);
00111     break;
00112   case SLL_ERROR:
00113     l=tr("Error");
00114     c=Qt::red;
00115     break;
00116 
00117   }
00118 
00119   QTreeWidgetItem *item=new QTreeWidgetItem(tree);
00120   item->setText(0, t);
00121   item->setText(1, l);
00122   item->setText(2, msg);
00123   item->setTextColor(0, c);
00124   item->setTextColor(1, c);
00125   item->setTextColor(2, c);
00126   tree->addTopLevelItem( item );
00127 }
00128 
00136 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::clearLog(){
00137   tree->clear();
00138 }
00139 
00144 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::exportLog(){
00145   // Export dialog
00146   LogExportDialog led(this);
00147   led.exec();
00148 
00149   QString fn=led.getFilename();
00150 
00151   LOGI("Exporting log :");
00152   LOGCATS("Log file name :");
00153   LOGCATS(fn.toLatin1());
00154   LOGCAT();
00155 
00156   // Header
00157   QFile file(fn);
00158   file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Text);
00159   QTextStream out(&file);
00160 
00161   out << "RainbruRPG-Server user log" <<endl;
00162   out << "Exported ";
00163 
00164   // Date and time
00165   QDateTime dt=QDateTime::currentDateTime();
00166   QString s=dt.toString("dd MMMM yyyy");
00167   QString s2=dt.toString("hh::mm");
00168   out << s << " at " << s2 << endl<< endl;
00169 
00170   // Tree srialization
00171   serializeTree(&out);
00172   file.close();
00173 }
00174 
00180 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::serializeTree(QTextStream* ts){
00181   for (int i=0; i<tree->topLevelItemCount(); i++){
00182     serializeTreeItem(ts, tree->topLevelItem(i));
00183   }
00184 }
00185 
00192 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::
00193 serializeTreeItem(QTextStream* ts, QTreeWidgetItem* it){
00194   LOGI("Item serialize");
00195 
00196   // First column
00197   ts->device()->write(it->text(0).toLatin1());
00198   ts->device()->write(" ");
00199 
00200   // Second column
00201   ts->device()->write(it->text(1).toLatin1(), 1);
00202   ts->device()->write(it->text(1).toLatin1(), 1);
00203   ts->device()->write(" ");
00204 
00205   // Last column
00206   ts->device()->write(it->text(2).toLatin1());
00207   ts->device()->write("\n");
00208 
00209 }
